Provides abstract classes with which to build games.

Wobbly - Class in edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.pong.logic
Extends the PaddleLogic class to create an artificial intelligence that tells a paddle to follow the height of the ball, with a persistent wobble added through a call to the random method of the Math class.
